caption: The video is consisted of two parts. The first party shows the scene of a big political rally, during which a woman is giving out a speech passionately. The woman seems to be harshly criticize something, and her action wins plenty of support from the audience. The second part of video shows a man walking in the woods. After walking, he found a secret hiding space near a house and talked with a woman hided there. The woman seemed to be scared and in danger. Two group of people might start a fight with each other.

global.question: When does the things in the video happens, acient, modern, or in the future?

what time does the video take place?(at day time or night time?)
global.answer: Both at night and at day time.
